name: house_with_memory
prompt: A house remembers everything that happens inside it. Write a conversation between the building and its new owner.
decoded: House: Hi, I'm glad to meet you. I've been here for a long time, and I've seen so much. I remember the previous owner, who used to have a big party every weekend. I also remember the time when the basement was flooded, and the house had to be evacuated.
